title: Where do I safely dispose or recycle Google hardware at end of life?
content:
I contacted Google support and was given this link to post my inquiry to the community.

I have a Google Pixel 2 phone and learned today that updates for it will end this year. The agent I spoke to said technically the phone will still work, just less secure

https://mobilesyrup.com/2020/10/05/google-pixel-2-series-end-of-life/
